contact-us.title: Contact Us
contact-us.description: We'd love to hear from you! Fill out the form below or email us at {0}.
contact-us.error-occured: An error occurred while submitting your message.
contact-us.submitted: Submitted your request, we will reply via email soon.

misc.help-translate: Want to help translate the site? Join our Discord and ask!

marketplace.title: marketplace
marketplace.item-removed-from-marketplace: This item was removed from marketplace.

what-is-marketplace.title: What is the Rainbow Six Siege Marketplace?
what-is-marketplace.description: The marketplace is a place where you can buy and sell items for Rainbow Six Siege. You can buy items from other players, or you can sell items you've unlocked yourself. This allows you to buy skins that were previously immensely rare and locked to a specific account.

what-currency.title: What is the currency used in the marketplace?
what-currency.description: You can only purchase items with R6 Credits, and you'll only receive R6 Credits when you sell an item.

how-can-i-trade.title: How can I trade items?
how-can-i-trade.description: We aren't affiliated with Ubisoft, so you will have to trade your items on the official {0}.

streaming-widget.title: Streaming Widget
streaming-widget.description: Streaming widgets are a great way to display your profile stats on your livestream. For now, ours is quite simple, but in the future we will provide a lot more customization. Currently it only supports ranked, but if you're looking for support for other modes, please reach out to us on {0}.
streaming-widget.widget-image-caption: Here's what our widget looks like:

how-to-use.title: How to use
how-to-use.step-1: 1. Copy paste your profile link in the box below & click copy
how-to-use.step-2: 2. Go to your livestream software and create a "Browser Source" in the "Sources" tab.
how-to-use.step-3: 3. Paste your Straming Widget Link in the "Browser Source" field.
how-to-use.step-4: 4. Adjust the size & positioning of the widget as desired.

ranked-sessions.title: Ranked Sessions
ranked-sessions.1: This chart graphs a profile's recent sessions and their rank after each session.
ranked-sessions.2: You can hover over individual points to see a session's details.
ranked-sessions.3: You can zoom by dragging over a range, and pan by holding control and dragging.

profile.update-time-out: Update timed out. Refresh the page and it will be soon.

update.timeout: Update timed out. Refresh the page and it will be done soon.

tooltip.1: This profile cannot be updated yet.
tooltip.2: You can stay on this profile and it will auto refresh when an update is available, for example when the player's match finishes.
tooltip.3: Generally hitting this refresh button isn't needed, but can help if you feel the profiles data isout of sync.
